name: taskter_task
description:
Run the `taskter task` command. Available subcommands:
- `add` --title <TITLE> [--description <DESC>]
- `list`
- `complete` --id <ID>
- `comment` --task-id <TASK_ID> --comment <COMMENT>
- `assign` --task-id <TASK_ID> --agent-id <AGENT_ID>
- `execute` --task-id <TASK_ID>
Examples:
`{"args": ["list"]}` lists tasks.
`{"args": ["add", "--title", "Demo"]}` adds a task.
